publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3517 Michael Matheson: Major Award for "Big in Falkirk"—That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Council and partners for winning a 2005 Scottish Thistle Award for "Big in Falkirk"; acknowledges the high standard of its competition, Edinburgh’s Hogmanay and International Pairs, Fife; praises the hard work and dedication of all involved in organising and participating in the event which is now recognised as Scotland’s number one street arts festival, and is confident that the winning of this award will mean that "Big in Falkirk" will continue to evolve and grow into a major international arts festival.Supported by: Alex Neil*, Linda Fabiani*

S2M-3517 Michael Matheson: Major Award for "Big in Falkirk"—That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Council and partners for winning a 2005 Scottish Thistle Award for "Big in Falkirk"; acknowledges the high standard of its competition, Edinburgh’s Hogmanay and International Pairs, Fife; praises the hard work and dedication of all involved in organising and participating in the event which is now recognised as Scotland’s number one street arts festival, and is confident that the winning of this award will mean that "Big in Falkirk" will continue to evolve and grow into a major international arts festival.Supported by: Alex Neil, Linda Fabiani
S2M-3517 Major Award for “Big in Falkirk” (lodged on 3 November 2005) Dennis Canavan*, Mr John Swinney*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-3517 Major Award for "Big in Falkirk" (lodged on 3 November 2005) Bruce Crawford*, Fiona Hyslop*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3517 Major Award for "Big in Falkirk" (lodged on 3 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-3517 Major Award for "Big in Falkirk" (lodged on 3 November 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*
